odyssey_description: Odyssey is your all-in-one travel platform: create AI-powered itineraries, share your adventures, follow fellow travelers, and discover amazing destinations worldwide.
features_description: From AI-powered itineraries to social sharing, Odyssey brings together everything you need for unforgettable journeys.
smart_route_desc: AI calculates the most efficient routes, saving you time and maximizing your adventure.
flexible_scheduling_desc: Build day-by-day itineraries that adapt to your pace, with the flexibility to adjust plans on the go.
budget_optimization_desc: Set your budget and get smart recommendations for cost-effective options.
traveler_feed_desc: Follow friends and fellow travelers, see updates, stories, and tips from the community.
share_your_journey_desc: Post photos, videos, and travel notes for others to discover and get inspired.
global_connections_desc: Join travel groups, connect with like-minded explorers, and discover trending destinations worldwide.
community_description: Follow travelers, share your adventures, get inspired by real experiences, and discover trending destinations.
connect_with_friends_desc: Follow friends, join travel groups, and interact with fellow explorers.
share_your_moments_desc: Upload photos, videos, and travel stories to inspire the community.
plan_trips_together_desc: Create itineraries, collaborate with friends, and share your planned routes.
join_odyssey_description: Join Odyssey to plan smart trips, share your journeys, and connect with travelers worldwide.
footer_description: A social travel platform to plan trips, share adventures, and connect with fellow travelers.

main_page.hero_title: Create Your Dream Trip with AI
main_page.hero_subtitle: Chat with our AI assistant to plan your perfect vacation
main_page.initial_message: Hi there! üëã I'm your AI travel assistant. Tell me about your dream vacation and I'll create a personalized itinerary just for you. Where would you like to go?
main_page.ai_suggestions_intro: Here are some amazing itineraries I found for you üåç

main_page.ai_travel_question: Got it! üöó How would you like to travel?
main_page.ai_route_confirm: Perfect! üåç I'll plan the best {{mode}} route for your "{{title}}" trip.
main_page.ai_customize_prompt: If there's anything you'd like me to change, just let me know and I'll adjust it for you!
main_page.ai_customize_done: Got it! ‚úèÔ∏è I've updated your itinerary based on your feedback.
main_page.ai_error_unavailable: We're sorry, but our AI service is currently unavailable. Please try again later. üôè
main_page.ai_error_busy: Sorry, the server is too busy right now... try again in a few minutes üò¢
main_page.feature_ai_text: Advanced AI creates personalized itineraries based on your preferences
main_page.feature_routes_text: Get optimized routes and schedules tailored to your travel style
main_page.feature_flexible_text: Plan trips of any duration with flexible itineraries that match your schedule

quick_actions.quick_adventure_action: I want an adventure trip with hiking and exploring
quick_actions.quick_culture_action: Cultural experience with local food tours

saveTrip.error: An error occurred while saving the trip.

guestWelcome.title: Welcome to Odyssey
guestWelcome.text: Join our community to share your adventures, interact with other travelers, and discover amazing trips.
